title: Set a Budget Together
description: Discuss and agree on shared expenses like utilities, groceries, and cleaning supplies.

title: Create a Cleaning Schedule
description: Plan weekly cleaning duties to avoid confusion and maintain cleanliness.

title: Be Considerate with Noise
description: Keep volume low during late hours and use headphones when needed.

title: Use a Shared Calendar
description: Coordinate chores, events, and guest visits using a digital calendar or app.

title: Discuss Guest Policies
description: Agree on how often guests can visit and whether overnight stays are acceptable.

title: Handle Conflicts Calmly
description: Address issues respectfully and privately without involving others or escalating.

title: Respect Shared Spaces
description: Clean up after yourself and avoid leaving personal items in common areas.

title: Appreciate Each Other
description: A simple thank-you goes a long way—show appreciation for your roommate’s efforts.
